originalText.text: Chie is the best, i am happy with her work every time. Professional, courteous and punctual. She It is by appointment only.

text.text: Chie is the best, i am happy with her work every time. Professional, courteous and punctual. She It is by appointment only.

originalText.text: Chie is an expert at cutting hair. She has a good sense of what styles will work with your hair texture. She is super chill, detailed and a perfectionist. I get so many compliments on my hair. Our whole family is won over and goes to her now :)

text.text: Chie is an expert at cutting hair. She has a good sense of what styles will work with your hair texture. She is super chill, detailed and a perfectionist. I get so many compliments on my hair. Our whole family is won over and goes to her now :)

originalText.text: Chie has been my hairdresser for many years and I was happy to follow her to her beautiful and conveniently-located salon in the East Village (try the coffee and empanadas at Southern Cross next door). She is really an artist that is able to cut and style many different types of hair. I can say this because I have friends that also go to her for cuts and color. She is absolutely meticulous and listens to your preferences before cutting your hair. A relaxing wash and conditioning is followed by a careful hair cut, followed by drying and her careful checking and adjustment of the cut. Then a lovely Shiatsu massage. She is a lovely kind person and I cannot recommend her enough! She follows all social-distancing guidelines, both client and Chie wear masks and the salon is spotless. The massage at the end does not happen now for obvious reasons.

originalText.text:
First let me start by saying I am disgusted by this hair salon,  I lived in this neighborhood for 15years and have never been treated so poorly like this place. I decided to try this place for a quick clean cut and wanted to cut my bangs as well, The Lady who I can see through the window had No customers and was sitting down on her phone.  I figure she’s not busy. So I rang the bell she came out from the salon, I said Hi I was interested in getting a hair cut and would like to know your price . She answered “ I have a another customer coming soon” Ok no problem! She never even gave me a price quote , I then asked what is a good time to come back or another day ? She answered” No I’m not taking anyone, Find  another HAIRSALON somewhere else pointing out the street ??? I couldn’t  believe how unprofessional! And Disgusting she was with me. I couldn’t understand if it was because I'm not from her culture but I felt very offended and makes me think she was being Racism and did not what to take me in for a haircut!l I will report this place for discrimination.
This one on Sunday Morning

originalText.text: Never had a better haircut. Maybe it's magic, maybe just sublime skills. I can't tell. Does it really matter?
